name: Meganium
author: kawayoo
flavor_text: Meganium’s breath has the power to revive dead grass and plants. It can make them healthy again.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon’s remaining HP is 50 or less, its attacks do 70 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Green Force
attacks.effect: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
